Articles.Content: I have frequent crashes in the VAB. When it happens it freezes my pc and I have to restart. The VAB and Spaceplane building are the only places I've had this problem so far. I have 8 gigs of RAM and am running the 64 bit version on Windows 10. I can paste whatever logs are needed but I'm not sure where they are located.
Hi @vanel, can you please take a look here, it will say where the logs are.
